title: Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw sees AI-biology convergence transforming healthcare
description: Biocon Chairperson Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw on Friday said the convergence of biological intelligence and artificial intelligence (AI) can drive a paradigm shift in medicine, enabling breakthroughs in predictive healthcare, regenerative science and lifespan management.

title: OpenAI, Microsoft Join UK-led Global Coalition To Safeguard AI Development
description: OpenAI and Microsoft have joined the United Kingdom's international coalition to safeguard artificial intelligence development. The technology companies have committed new funding to the UK AI Security Institute's flagship Alignment Project to ensure advanced AI systems remain safe, secure, and under human control.
content: OpenAI and Microsoft have joined the United Kingdom's international coalition to safeguard artificial intelligence development. The technology companies have committed new funding to the UK AI Security Institute's flagship Alignment Project to ensure... [3216 chars]

title: Europe is betting big on India, AI Summit reveals how
description: European leaders' strong turnout at the AI Impact Summit points at a pivot towards India as a partner in AI technology. With artificial intelligence's adoption lagging in Europe, EU nations seemingly see collaboration with India as key to shaping inclusive, globally relevant AI.
content: After trade, tech is the domain where Europe is putting its faith in India. That was revealed by the big presence of European leaders at the ongoing India AI Impact Summit. India can score big in the artificial intelligence (AI) space, and Europe, se... [6230 chars]

title: India set to provide global leadership in AI: Andhra CM Chandrababu Naidu
description: Naidu also announced that the Andhra government has partnered with IBM to skill one hundred thousand youngsters in the state across artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, and quantum computing
content:
Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu on Friday expressed optimism about India's growing leadership in artificial intelligence, stating that the country is set to play a global leadership role in AI and related industries.

title: A threat, opportunity or pure BS? AI comes to dominate earnings season
description: Most companies argue the rise of artificial intelligence will be a help to their businesses, although some are wary. More often than not, investors disagree.
content: Artificial intelligence has been called the “bullshit buzzword” of this month’s earnings season. Macquarie set the tone – and possibly a record – last week when it mentioned the term 82 times in an earnings call. Arch rival Commonwealth Bank had a de... [342 chars]

title: Netizens outraged over Congress workers' shirtless showdown at AI Summit: 'Insulting India globally'
description: The protest comes on the final day of the five‑day summit, which has brought together global leaders and technology experts to discuss the future of artificial intelligence.
content:
New Delhi:
A group of Youth Congress activists staged a dramatic protest, removing their shirts and chanting slogans against the central government, at the India AI Impact Summit in New Delhi on Friday. The demonstration, which they said was in oppos... [1875 chars]

title: Musician Pheelz says music needs a soul and AI cannot compete with that
description: Nigerian producer-turned-artist Pheelz believes sound and spirit are inseparable — an idea that shapes his argument against the rise of artificial intelligence in music: that true creativity requires soul, something technology cannot replicate.
content: Nigerian producer-turned-artist Pheelz learned music in church, believing sound and spirit are inseparable — a core idea that shapes his argument about the rise of artificial intelligence in music: that true creativity requires soul, something techno... [4093 chars]

title: UN touts panel for human control of AI as leaders weigh message
description: A new UN panel on artificial intelligence aims to “make human control a technical reality”, the global body’s chief said Friday as leaders at a New Delhi summit weighed their message on the future of the divisive technology. The flip side of the gold rush...

title: PM Modi holds bilateral talks with UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres
description: Earlier in the day, Guterres called for utilising Artificial Intelligence for global good and mitigate challenges being faced by humanity. He urged countries to come together and prepare, protect, and invest in people. Today international cooperation is difficult. Trust is strained, and technological rivalry is growing.
content:
New Delhi [India], February 20 (ANI): United Nations Secretary General Antonio Guterres held bilateral talks with Prime Narendra Modi in the national capital.
Guterres arrived in India to attend the AI Impact Summit 2026.
